appDescription.message: Intercept and accelerate downloads with rdm (Rust Download Manager).
appDescription.description: Short description shown in the Firefox Add-ons store

monitoringLabel.description: Label for the monitoring toggle in the popup

clearBtn.description: Button to clear the detected video list

moreFormatsBtn.description: Button to request additional video formats

errorNotRunning.message: rdm is not running. Start it to enable browser integration.
errorNotRunning.description: Message shown when the rdm server cannot be reached

launchRdm.description: Button to launch the rdm application

disabledTitle.description: Heading shown in the disabled popup

disabledHint.message: Enable it from the rdm application settings to start intercepting downloads.
disabledHint.description: Hint text in the disabled popup
